_header: Martha was a good woman all so ye heareth tell
Subjects: Martha, saint, life of; Fronton, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Martha and St. Fronton in the South English Legendary

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
SEinte Martha a god womman was as ȝe hereþ of tellShe
                    fong oure lord in hire hous as it seiþ in þe
                    gospel…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…Nou lord for þe heye loue Þat þu kiddest Martha
                    þerebring vs to heye blisse þat þe angels here soule
                    bere
BodLauMis463.Note: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line.

Bod779.First Lines:
Marþa was a good woman s al so ȝe hereþ
                    telleȝhe herberuid Ihesu crist as we findeþ in þe
                    gospelle…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…& leue vs here on erþe doon oure sinnus to bete&
                    we mot to þat ioye come ar we oure lif here lete

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Seint Martha gud wommon was as ȝe schule here telleHeo feng vr
                    lord in hire hous as hit seiþ in þe gospelle…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Lord for þe heȝe loue þat kuddest Martha
                    þereBring vs to þat heȝe blisse þere þin angeles
                    hire soule bere. AMEN.
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

CamCCC145.First Lines:
Sein martha god womman was as ȝe hureþ aldai telleHe
                    aueng oure louerd in hure hous as it seiþ in þe
                    gospelle…
CamCCC145.Last Lines:
…Nou louerd for þe heie loue þat þou kuddest martha
                    þereBring us to þe heie blisse þat þin angles hare
                    soule bere
CamCCC145.Editions:
D’Evelyn,  Charlotte,  and  A. J. Mill, eds.  
             The South English Legendary: Corpus Christi College Cambridge MS. 145
                and British Museum MS. Harley 2277, with variants from Bodley MS. Ashmole 43 and
                British Museum MS. Cotton Julius D.ix.
EETS
         o.s. 235 (1959), 236 (1956); repr. 1967: 348.

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Seint Martha a goed womman was as ȝe hureþ al day
                    telleȜeo affeng oure lord in hure hous as hit seiþ in þe
                    gospelle…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…Now lord ffor þe heye loue þat þou kuddest Martha
                    þereBring vs to þe heye blisse þat þine aungeles hure
                    to bere

CamTCC605.First Lines:
SEint martha was a goud womman as ȝe hureþ tellehes a
                    fenge oure lord in hure hous as hit seþ in þe
                    godspelle…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…Now for þe swete loue þat þu cuddest martha
                    þerbrynge ous to þe hey Ioie þat þyne angelis hure
                    bere

Digital Facsimile of Trinity College Cambridge MS R.3.25.

BLEge1993.First Lines: Seint Martha god womman was as ȝe schulen here telleHeo aveng vre lord in hire hous as it seiþ in þe gospelle…
BLEge1993.Last Lines: …Now lord vor þe heiȝe loue þat þou kuddest martha þereBringe vs to þe heiȝe blisse þat þin angles here soule to bere

BLEge2891.First Lines: SEin Martha god womman was as ȝe hureþ alday telleHeo aneng oure louerd in hure hous as it seiþ In þe gospelle…
BLEge2891.Last Lines: …Nou louerd for þe heie loue þat þou kuddest martha þereBring us to þe heie blisse þat þin angles hure soule bere

BLHar2277.First Lines: SEinte Martha a god womman was as ȝe hureþ aldai telleHeo afeng oure louerd in hire hous as hit saiþ in þe godspelle…
BLHar2277.Last Lines: …& bureden hit wiþ here owe hond oure louerd & Seint ffroutonA fairere buringe þan þer was me ne hurde neuere non…

BLAdd10301.First Lines:
SEin Martha gode womman was as ȝe hureþ al day
                    telleȝo reseyvid oure lorde in hire hous as it seiþ in þe
                    gospelle…
BLAdd10301.Last Lines:
…Nou lord for þe heye love þat þou kuddest Martha
                    þereBring vs to þe heye blisse þat þin angles hure
                    soule bere
BLAdd10301.Attributed Title:
Sancta Martha (f. 149, by scribe in margin beside first line);
                        Martha (RT)
